title: Hour 1 - MLB ASG Technology, Manti Te'o Documentary
itunes:title: Hour 1 - MLB ASG Technology, Manti Te'o Documentary
description:
Dan was pleasantly surprised by the use of new technology in last night's MLB All-Star Game. And he talks about the documentary being produced about Manti Te'o getting catfished.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
